value.title: Fix errors when importing or converting date columns in Power BI - Power BI Tips & Tricks #21
value.excerpt: Today I will show you how to fix the errors that you get when you try to convert a column to a date in Power BI/ Power Query. value.title: Get only the rows you need in Power Query from your files.

value.title: Insert text anywhere in a cell without adding a new column using the Power Query User Interface.

value.title: Managing changing column names in Power Query #10: (M)agic (M)ondays
